item.title: Initial Concept
item.description:
Initial Concept

The story will conclude with a twist... hands over his eyes and counting, the father waits to see his daughter in her dress. Just then manicured adult hands reach around from behind to uncover his eyes, prompting him to turn around and see his daughter fully grown, wearing her wedding dress on her wedding day. In fact, the entire time he was getting ready, he was remembering special moments theyâ€™ve shared leading up to this day.
